remarks: Transfer existential uniqueness from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2012.)  (Revised by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)
statement:
reuxfr2d.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. B ) -> A e. B ) $.
reuxfr2d.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> E* y e. B x = A ) $.
reuxfr2d $p |- ( ph -> ( E! x e. B E. y e. B ( x = A /\ ps ) <-> E! y e. B ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps x $.
